short_summary: Procurement of office furniture and installations from October 2023 to January 2024
description: purchase, delivery and installation of office furniture to Ottawa, Ontario between October 2023 and January 2024
full_summary:
# Government of Canada Tender Announcement

**Tender Number**
EH990-231323 - Workspaces Category 6

**Reference Number**
WS3782457838-Doc3782540225

**Amendment Number**
2nd Amendment

**Publication and Closing Dates**

 Published: January 25, 2023
 Tender Closing: February 9, 2023, 2:00 pm EST

**Contract Details**
Start Date: March 31, 2023
 End Date: August 31, 2023

**Procurement Overview**

Public Works Government Services Canada (PWGSC) on behalf of Real Property Services Branch solicits bids to acquire office furniture from a reputable supplier. This project involves the purchase, delivery, and installation of category 6 workspaces furniture to Ottawa, Ontario between October 2023 and January 2024.

**Notice and Submissions**

*   The RFP document and attachments can be accessed by logging into your SAP Ariba account.
*   All required supporting documentation, and bid submission must be submitted by February 9, 2023, at 2:00 pm EST.
*   Late submissions will be declared non-responsive.

**Key Requirements**

\*   The successful bidder will be required to meet or exceed the solicited requirements outlined in the RFP document.

**Notice type and Method of Tendering**
*   RFP against Supply Arrangement
*   Competitive - Selective tendering

**Trade Agreements and Regions**
\*   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
\*   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
\*   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
*   National Capital Region (NCR)

**Contact Information**
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PWGSC)
Michelle Wong, Business Development and Integration Lead
Email: [michelle.wong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:michelle.wong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
Phone: Not Available, Fax: Not Available

**Notice URL**
http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15226080?extsite=MTUyMjYwODBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg== documentation provided by the bid was very incomplete, but I managed to glean some information.

In writing the announcement for the government tender, it was not an issue with translating the text from English to French. The main issue was bullet
